title: TTC - Biology and Human Behavior
description:
TTC Video - Biology and Human Behavior, 1st Ed (1996, OOP, VHS)


VCR ->MPEG Capture -> H264 (800kbps Video/96 AAC Audio)

This course was never produced as a DVD set (VHS-only) and went out of print many years ago. 


This set of eight lectures provides an overview of how the brain works, how it regulates the functioning of the body including the release of hormones, and how such hormones, in turn, regulate the functioning of the brain. The series begins by explaining the workings of a single brain cell - the neuron - and then progresses to more sophisticated communication structures including how two neurons communicate with each other, how clusters of neurons carry out complex operations, and how such operations influence organs and glands throughout the body.


extracted audio is also included in a separate folder
